chunks.zh: 再谈年龄和找工作问题，很多人都不自量力认不清自己
chunks.en: Talking again about age and job hunting, many people overestimate themselves and don't recognize their own limitations.

chunks.zh: 看到很多学历一般 年龄超过了 40 ，薪资都大约要求 30K~50K~80K 月薪之外，
chunks.en: Seeing many people with average education and over 40 years old, all asking for salaries of around 30K~50K~80K+ per month,

chunks.zh: 1. 哪里给的他们地气要求这么高那？还是自己认为我就值这个价格，低于这个的我不做，
chunks.en: 1. Where did they get the confidence to demand such high salaries? Or do they just think they are worth this price and won't work for anything less?

chunks.zh: 2. 还是之前公司给的这么高，就要这么高那？
chunks.en: 2. Or is it that their previous companies paid them so much, so they demand the same?

chunks.zh: 3. 到底的平台成就了你，还是自己就值这个数字那？
chunks.en: 3. Did the platform ultimately make you successful, or are you really worth that number?

chunks.zh: 8K ，15K 不能干？那找工作干嘛那？
chunks.en: Can't work for 8K or 15K? Then why are you looking for a job?

chunks.zh: 学历一般，年龄大了，也没有做出什么业绩或者晋升
chunks.en: Average education, older age, and no achievements or promotions.

chunks.zh: 别着急，你也会活到 40 岁那天的，如果活不到，那当我没说
chunks.en: Don't worry, you'll live to be 40 one day. If you don't, then never mind.

chunks.zh: 这些话去掉头尾,其实也适合现在的你,请你主动降薪吧.
chunks.en: If you remove the introduction and conclusion from these words, they actually apply to you now. Please voluntarily reduce your salary.

chunks.zh: 如果你招过人，且不是 HR ，就知道唯学历论有多么愚蠢。
chunks.en: If you've ever hired people and aren't in HR, you'll know how foolish it is to be solely focused on academic qualifications.

chunks.zh: 任何从单一维度来评判人都是愚蠢的。
chunks.en: It's foolish to judge people based on a single dimension.

chunks.zh: 工作能力也是多维度的，一个团队需要各种单项能力突出的人。
chunks.en: Work ability is also multi-dimensional, and a team needs people with outstanding skills in various areas.

chunks.zh: 本来是没兴趣跟帖回复的，但是见你大周六的在摸鱼论坛如此勤奋地宣扬你那搞笑且愚蠢的唯学历论，还跑去别人一个诚心找工作的帖子下宣扬，忍不住了
chunks.en: Originally, I wasn't interested in replying to this post, but seeing you so diligently promoting your ridiculous and foolish focus on academic qualifications on a forum for slackers on a Saturday, and even going to someone else's post where they were sincerely looking for a job to promote it, I couldn't help but reply.

chunks.zh: 你也别自己给自己贴金，还 40 岁的时候 8k 都肯干。
chunks.en: And don't try to flatter yourself by saying you'd be willing to work for 8k at 40.

chunks.zh: 你现在几岁，月薪怎样？
chunks.en: How old are you now, and what is your monthly salary?

chunks.zh: 你 40 岁的时候凭什么觉得自己值 8k ？
chunks.en: Why do you think you'll be worth 8k when you're 40?

chunks.zh: 大周末的，是没兴趣爱好、没生活，还是周六不得不加班跑所以来这里摸鱼？
chunks.en: On a weekend, do you have no hobbies, no life, or do you have to work overtime on Saturday so you come here to slack off?

chunks.zh: 这么没事干，不如好好提升下自己的认知吧
chunks.en: If you have so much free time, you might as well improve your understanding.

chunks.zh: 楼主你这文字水平和阿诺有的一拼，乱用格式段落，乱用标点符号，乱省略主语，还有“30K~50K~80K 月薪之外”这种莫名其妙的表达方式。
chunks.en: OP, your writing level is comparable to Arnold's, misusing formatting paragraphs, misusing punctuation, omitting subjects randomly, and also using bizarre expressions like '30K~50K~80K+ monthly salary'.

chunks.zh: 事实上，大龄打工人要 1W 薪资，简历更过不了。
chunks.en: In fact, older workers can't even get their resumes past the screening stage if they ask for a 10K salary.

chunks.zh: 这狗奴才又让我想起来鲁迅：   底层互害，是奴才的本性 。  奴才跪着还会嘲笑你没有他跪的姿势标准
chunks.en: This lackey reminds me of Lu Xun's words: 'Mutual harm among the lower classes is the nature of slaves.' Slaves will even laugh at you for not kneeling in the correct posture.

chunks.zh: 不说废话，楼主我🌞泥🐎
chunks.en: Enough nonsense, OP I f**k your mother.

chunks.zh: 学历一般，年龄大了，吃你家大米了？为啥带那么大恶意。
chunks.en: Average education, older age, are they eating your rice? Why so much malice?

chunks.zh: 你要是招人，评估候选者能力是否满足岗位要求，自己能提供的薪资水平对方是否满意即可，哪来那么多 OS 。
chunks.en: If you're hiring, just assess whether the candidate's abilities meet the job requirements, and whether the salary you can offer is satisfactory to them. Why so many internal thoughts?

chunks.zh: 你认为对方能力不足，还狮子大开口，婉拒就可以，都是市场行为，无可厚非。
chunks.en: If you think someone's abilities are insufficient and they're asking for too much, just politely decline. It's all market behavior, perfectly understandable.

chunks.zh: 国内这环境真差，美帝一个 40 岁的工程师正是嘴挣钱的时候，比如我的 Tech Lead ，保守估计 30 万美金一年是有的
chunks.en: The environment in China is really bad. In the US, a 40-year-old engineer is in their prime earning years. For example, my Tech Lead makes at least $300,000 a year.

chunks.zh: 完全不懂逻辑在哪里，感觉就是来骗铜币的。
chunks.en: I don't understand the logic at all, it feels like you're just here to get copper coins.

chunks.zh: 如果因为能力觉得不值对应薪资，那选有能力的年轻人就行了。
chunks.en: If you think their abilities aren't worth the corresponding salary, then choose capable young people.

chunks.zh: 如果是因为给不出对应薪资，招符合价位的人即可 。
chunks.en: If it's because you can't pay the corresponding salary, then hire people who fit your price range.

chunks.zh: 除非是只能通过工作年限来判断求职者能力，然后给出的岗位定价又没有市场竞争力，除了发帖暴露自己的无能之外貌似也解决不了问题啊，毕竟大龄打工人最不缺的的就是被 PUA 的经历了。
chunks.en: Unless you can only judge a job seeker's ability based on their years of experience, and then the job's price isn't competitive in the market, it seems like you're not solving any problems besides exposing your own incompetence by posting this, after all, older workers have plenty of experience being PUA'd.

chunks.zh: 底层牛马乘着时代红利，一朝得势，站在所谓制高点颐指气使，但是也别忘了，如果没有脱离自己所在的阶级，回旋镖总有打到自己的一天。
chunks.en: Lower-class laborers, taking advantage of the era's benefits and gaining power for a time, stand on so-called high ground and boss people around, but don't forget, if you haven't escaped your own class, the boomerang will always hit you one day.

chunks.zh: 能力、工作态度跟年龄关系不大。
chunks.en: Ability and work ethic have little to do with age.

chunks.zh: 到了四十能力、态度都可以的话，要这么多无可厚非（是否有这么多资深的坑是另外一个问题了）。
chunks.en: If someone has the ability and attitude at forty, it's understandable to ask for that much (whether there are so many senior positions is another question).

chunks.zh: 要多少当然也跟市场环境有关系，在互联网不景气的前提下，人多坑少，如果不降低预期缺失是不太好找的。
chunks.en: Of course, how much someone asks also depends on the market environment. With the internet in a downturn, there are more people than jobs, and it's hard to find one if you don't lower your expectations.

chunks.zh: 但是人家现在 30~80K ，能力肯定不再是初级工程师了，直接降低到 8K~15K 去做个初级工作也不太可能吧。
chunks.en: But if someone is currently making 30~80K, their ability is definitely no longer that of a junior engineer, it's unlikely to directly lower to 8K~15K to do a junior job.

chunks.zh: 市场也没不景气到这种地步。
chunks.en: The market isn't bad to that extent.

chunks.zh: 感觉 LZ 公司可能是没啥钱，觉得现在不景气能便宜捞到高性价比的大龄工程师。
chunks.en: I feel that LZ's company may not have much money and thinks that they can cheaply find cost-effective older engineers now that the economy is bad.

chunks.zh: 可是大家现在宁愿在家躺着也不想去做苦工牛马。
chunks.en: But everyone would rather lie at home than be a hard-working laborer.

chunks.zh: 这个应该是 LZ 公司所遇到的最大矛盾。
chunks.en: This should be the biggest contradiction that LZ's company is facing.

chunks.zh: 把程序员换成 40+大龄剩女，我感觉就没人怼你了，立刻逆转，主要因为 v 友真的会到 40+, 但是大部分 v 友不是女生
chunks.en: If you changed 'programmer' to '40+ older single woman', I feel that no one would criticize you. It would be the opposite, mainly because V2EX users will actually reach 40+, but most V2EX users are not female.

chunks.zh: 这个楼主有点傻逼。
chunks.en: This OP is a bit of an idiot.

chunks.zh: 第一，隐含了年龄歧视；（潜台词就是 35 岁都该退休了，40 岁还有工作，哪怕扫厕所，都应该感恩戴德了，还挑三拣四，还要求高工资？）
chunks.en: First, it implies age discrimination; (the subtext is that people should retire at 35, and if they still have a job at 40, even if it's sweeping toilets, they should be grateful, and not be picky or ask for high salaries?)

chunks.zh: 第二，没有实际根据的能力歧视；（别人开多少价都是别人的权利，你想知道别人为什么喊这个价，你就虚心请教，让别人论证，而不是由你叽叽歪歪）
chunks.en: Second, ability discrimination without any factual basis; (it's everyone's right to ask for whatever price they want. If you want to know why someone is asking for that price, you should humbly ask them to justify it, instead of complaining)

chunks.zh: 第三，对人本身的歧视；（平台是啥东西？没有人的东西算个 P 平台？国家再牛逼，不也是纳税人供出来的？叽叽歪歪，脑袋不正，下梁歪。）
chunks.en: Third, discrimination against people themselves; (what is a platform? Without people, what's a platform worth? Isn't even the most powerful country supported by taxpayers? Complaining, your mind isn't right, the lower beam is crooked.)

chunks.zh: 招不起人破防了
chunks.en: Can't afford to hire people, so you're triggered.

chunks.zh: typical 国人想法，纯功利主义、达尔文思想，实际上典型的思想落后的人。
chunks.en: Typical Chinese thinking, pure utilitarianism, Darwinism, actually typical of people with outdated thinking.

chunks.zh: 从大的角度，上个版本的功利主义、达尔文思想最后导致的就是法西斯主义，最后世界大战
chunks.en: From a macro perspective, the previous version of utilitarianism and Darwinism ultimately led to fascism and the World War.

chunks.zh: 从小的角度，我们善待老人对弱者同情是因为自己都有可能在某个领域变成弱者，你难道没有啥状态不好的时候么还是可能需要走出功利主义
chunks.en: From a micro perspective, we treat the elderly kindly and sympathize with the weak because we may all become weak in some area, don't you ever have times when you aren't in good shape or may need to move away from utilitarianism.

chunks.zh: 希望 op 到了 40 岁， 也可以拿着 15k 的工资， 爽歪歪
chunks.en: Hope OP can also take a 15k salary at 40, and be very happy.

chunks.zh: @ily433664 8K 找不到只能更低哈 6K ，如果国家允许通缩到 800 ，那也也得干呀，看来社会不能容忍工资降低或者经济通缩哈
chunks.en: @ily433664 If you can't find a job for 8K, it can only be lower, 6K. If the country allows deflation to 800, then you have to do it. It seems that society cannot tolerate wage cuts or economic deflation.

chunks.zh: 你是打工人吗? 为什么背叛自己的阶级, 为资本家维护利益? 我很少说话用叹号, 你看好了:你背叛了自己的阶级!!!你背叛了自己的阶级!!!你背叛了自己的阶级!!!
chunks.en: Are you a worker? Why are you betraying your class and defending the interests of capitalists? I rarely use exclamation marks in my speech. Look carefully: you have betrayed your class!!! You have betrayed your class!!! You have betrayed your class!!!

chunks.zh: 正好相反，年纪大了以后才能认清自己。
chunks.en: On the contrary, you can only recognize yourself after you get older.

chunks.zh: 刚毕业的时候不清楚自己的价值给个 8k10k 也愿意当牛马
chunks.en: When you first graduate, you don't know your own value and are willing to be a hard worker for 8k or 10k.
